text: Akka ay ten id Nessenker, iwakken ad mesteqsin. Inna yiwen segsen: "acêal n lweqt ay tesâaddam"? Nnan d: "nesâadda ass ne$ ur ibbwiv wass". Nnan: "Mass nnwen Yif akw akken Izôa ay tesâaddam. Aznet ar temdint, yiwen segwen, s idrimen agi nnwen. Ad iwali anwa lqut iûfan mavi, ad awen d iawi ôôeéq, segs. Ad iêader iman is, iwakken ur awen ipfaq yiwen.
